Posts.Content: Hello I was wondering if anyone could possibly help me I was referred to a consultant aylt the hospital for a milky discharge from my left nipple I had a scan and they came across a condition called prominent ductal pattern! I have never heard of this before but I googled it and it said its a risk of developing breast cancer but didnt give clear information it was a bit sketchy. Has anyone heard of this im so frightend to have seen my risk of cancer could be high due to this condition.
Posts.Title: Frightend!

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for replying to me I will seek further advice.
Posts.Title: Frightend!
